term.title: tetrapyrroles

item.text: Natural pigments containing four pyrrole rings joined by one-carbon units linking position 2 of one pyrrole ring to position 5 of the next. Porphyrins are macrocyclic tetrapyrroles. E.g. bilin (a linear tetrapyrrole). [image: Not defined]
